publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1459 Mr Jamie Stone: Improvement in Scottish Small Business Sector-That the Parliament welcomes the publication of the Federation of Small Businesses in Scotland membership survey, Lifting Barriers to Growth in UK Small Businesses 2004, in particular the findings that 58% of its members had experienced an increase in turnover in the past 12 months, that nearly a third have increased their number of employees, that there has been a rapid rise in uptake of broadband from 3% in 2002 to 21% in 2003 and an increase in the number of women who own a small business and that more than half expect their business to grow within the next two years and, furthermore, supports the work of the Scottish Executive, Scottish Enterprise and the Business Gateways in helping small businesses to achieve growth.
